wblut.hemesh.modifiers
Class HEM_Extrude

java.lang.Object
  wblut.hemesh.modifiers.HEM_Modifier
      wblut.hemesh.modifiers.HEM_Extrude
All Implemented Interfaces:
HE_Manipulator
public class HEM_Extrude
extends HEM_Modifier

Extrudes and scales a face along its face normal.

Author:
Frederik Vanhoutte (W:Blut)
